ownerships.owner: Flatbush 340 Lender LLC (Loan Receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC; Brooklyn, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as President and Authorized Signatory of 340 Flatbush Lender, LLC from Dec 1, 2015, to Jan 1, 2017. The business entity holds a loan receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC, Brooklyn, NY.

Jared Kushner served as Non-member Manager of Flatbush 340 Lender, LLC from Dec 1, 2015, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 or more in Interest income from Flatbush 340 Lender LLC (Loan Receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC; Brooklyn, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump''s senior adviser. Because there is no indication his interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
